mcq.statement: Find the correctly punctuated sentence: After surviving this ordeal, the trapper felt relieved, After surviving, this ordeal' the trapper felt relieved., After surviving this ordeal the trapper, felt relieved,After surviving, this ordeal the trapper felt relieved.

options.a: After surviving this ordeal, the trapper felt relieved
options.b: After surviving, this ordeal' the trapper felt relieved.
options.c: After surviving this ordeal the trapper, felt relieved
options.d: After surviving, this ordeal the trapper felt relieved.
